Title: Day 8: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
Plot: As the clock ticks toward the climactic series finale, three hours remain and a ruthless Jack Bauer is on an unwavering mission to uncover the truth, which only complicates circumstances for President Taylor as she prepares for a signing ceremony. Meanwhile, President Logan comes face-to-face with a formidable foe, and Chloe leads CTU on a high-stakes collision course with Jack Bauer.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Annie Wersching, Mary Lynn Rajskub
